survey_name: Employee Preferences for Hybrid Workspace Setup Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on workspace setup preferences in hybrid work environments to optimize comfort and productivity.

questions.question_text: How many days per week do you currently work in the office?
questions.client_notes: Use radio buttons for clear single-selection. Mobile-friendly vertical layout recommended.

script.question_text: How many days per week do you currently work in the office?

questions.question_text: Select all workspace amenities you consider essential for office days:
questions.client_notes: Checkbox format allows multiple selections. Randomize option order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: Select all workspace amenities you consider essential for office days:

questions.question_text: Describe your ideal hybrid workspace setup in 2-3 sentences:
questions.client_notes: Text field with 300-character limit. Example placeholder text improves response quality.

script.question_text: Describe your ideal hybrid workspace setup in 2-3 sentences:

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with current office technology (e.g., conference room AV, docking stations)?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale with neutral midpoint. Include N/A option for accuracy.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with current office technology (e.g., conference room AV, docking stations)?
